duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop valuation and accounting analyses to help clients resolve complex disputes.
Conduct research and prepare reports synthesizing complex analyses.
Participate in group learning projects to enhance financial modeling and communication skills.

education_certification.credential: Pursuing a Bachelor’s Degree with a major in accounting, finance, economics, or a Masters of Accounting with an expected graduation date between December 2024 to June 2025. Preference: Goal of obtaining Certified Public Accountant (CPA) license and/or valuation credentials.
